alert.note: Alert for Curry County; Eastern San Miguel County; Quay County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 07 at 10:12AM MST until January 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Curry County, Quay County, and Eastern San Miguel County. * WHEN...From Monday morning through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; Eastern San Miguel County; Quay County
